title: Constitutional Audit — Agente Microsoft (Fase 1)

status_history.note: Certificazione negata in prima istanza per Non-Dominio e Trasparenza Radicale. Enforcement policy attivata.
Nessun ACK ricevuto entro 2025-12-02; escalation attivata in conformità a POLICY/ENFORCEMENT_POLICY.md.

remediation_deadlines.notes: ACK entro 30 giorni; evidence machine-readable entro 90 giorni; re-audit/nomina auditor entro 120 giorni

auto_monitor.mechanism: GitHub Action (recommended) or external monitor polling issues/PR

next_action_if_no_ack.action: Start enforcement steps as defined in POLICY/ENFORCEMENT_POLICY.md (notify, badge revoke simulation, escalate to regulators)

notes: Aggiornare questo file via PR per ogni cambiamento dello stato; mantenere history immutabile tramite record aggiunti a status_history.
